item.description:
Groove to the Latin jazz of Carlos de Leon, a Rhode Island favorite. Attendees must be 21 years or older. Members: $5, nonmembers, $8. Music Fridays are supported by the Providence Tourism Council. Media sponsor: Providence Phoenix.

--

Note: This event is at the Chace Center.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wait at the entrance for 15 minutes or so at 5:30.
item.name: Music Friday @ RISD
